item.title: Let’s fly away
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row padding_top_multiplier="3x" padding_bottom_multiplier=""][vc_column content_width="custom" horizontal_content_position="center" custom_content_width="770"][crocal_title margin_bottom="30"]A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring.[/crocal_title][vc_column_text]

A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed that I neglect my talents. I should be incapable of drawing a single stroke at the present moment; and yet I feel that I never was a greater artist than now.

[/vc_column_text][crocal_empty_space][vc_column_text]

When, while the lovely valley teems with vapour around me, and the meridian sun strikes the upper surface of the impenetrable foliage of my trees, and but a few stray gleams steal into the inner sanctuary, I throw myself down among the tall grass by the trickling stream; and, as I lie close to the earth, a thousand unknown plants are noticed by me: when I hear the buzz of the little world among the stalks, and grow familiar with the countless indescribable forms of the insects and flies.

[/vc_column_text][crocal_empty_space height_multiplier="3x"][crocal_title margin_bottom="30"]A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia.[/crocal_title][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][crocal_gallery ids="180,181,182" grid_image_mode="medium" columns_tablet_landscape="3" columns_tablet_portrait="3" gutter_size="30" animation="eut-fade-in" overlay_opacity="0" image_link_mode="none"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_bottom_multiplier=""][vc_column content_width="custom" horizontal_content_position="center" custom_content_width="770"][vc_column_text]

When, while the lovely valley teems with vapour around me, and the meridian sun strikes the upper surface of the impenetrable foliage of my trees, and but a few stray gleams steal into the inner sanctuary, I throw myself down among the tall grass by the trickling stream; and, as I lie close to the earth, a thousand unknown plants are noticed by me: when I hear the buzz of the little world among the stalks, and grow familiar with the countless indescribable forms of the insects and flies, then I feel the presence of the Almighty, who formed us in his own image, and the breath of that universal love which bears and sustains us, as it floats around us in an eternity of bliss; and then, my friend, when darkness overspreads my eyes, and heaven and earth seem.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Interdum et malesuada fames ac ante ipsum primis in faucibus. Aenean sagittis fermentum interdum. Suspendisse est velit, facilisis ut sodales dictum, tempor id dolor. Pellentesque dictum congue vehicula. Nam tellus mauris, aliquet eu ultricies id, mattis ut libero.

Maecenas id dolor quis quam suscipit vulputate. Ut fermentum pharetra lorem at imperdiet. Phasellus eu metus felis. In eu consectetur neque, sit amet placerat lacus. In hac habitasse platea dictumst. Vivamus nec mauris mi.

Nullam fringilla nunc augue, eget mattis nulla malesuada non. Maecenas pretium, augue a vulputate venenatis, justo justo interdum eros, iaculis maximus erat neque quis diam. In gravida imperdiet erat. Nullam nibh odio, auctor ac lacus congue, congue consequat risus. Proin et mi ipsum. Quisque vehicula vestibulum iaculis. Cras congue imperdiet aliquam. Aliquam erat volutpat. Phasellus ac accumsan est. Curabitur ornare elementum venenatis. Vestibulum finibus tincidunt orci, ut fermentum nibh accumsan eget.[/vc_column_text][crocal_empty_space][crocal_title heading="link-text"]Emiliya Perevalova[/crocal_title][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier="3x" padding_bottom_multiplier=""][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" text_align="center"][vc_column_text text_style="leader-text"]Cras leo lacus, iaculis et dignissim sit amet, sodales eu neque. Duis viverra urna dui, id tincidunt magna faucibus quis. Donec ac enim tincidunt, gravida elit at, condimentum urna. Sed porta velit in ligula hendrerit mollis. Nunc ut mattis neque. Donec non metus non ex pretium sagittis in et sapien.[/vc_column_text][crocal_empty_space][crocal_title heading="link-text"]Dobroslawa Antokolskiy[/crocal_title][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier="3x" padding_bottom_multiplier=""][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" text_align="center"][vc_column_text text_style="leader-text"]Vivamus magna dui, fermentum eget purus non, mattis pharetra nunc. Sed tincidunt, sem a efficitur gravida, mi erat bibendum elit, vitae pharetra ligula magna vitae orci. Mauris gravida est eget ipsum bibendum.[/vc_column_text][crocal_empty_space][crocal_title heading="link-text"]Freddy Kauschke[/crocal_title][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier="6x" padding_bottom_multiplier="3x" rc_link_color="dark" rc_link_hover_color="primary-1"][vc_column text_align="center"][crocal_title heading="h1" margin_bottom="30"]SAY HELLO:[/crocal_title][crocal_title heading="link-text"]maria.carlson@crocalblogger.com[/crocal_title][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier="3x" padding_bottom_multiplier="3x" rc_heading_color="primary-6"][vc_column text_align="center"][crocal_icon icon_size="small" icon_fontawesome="fa fa-instagram" icon_color="primary-6" margin_bottom="12"][crocal_title heading="link-text"]Follow me on Instagram[/crocal_title][crocal_empty_space][crocal_instagram access_token="7999905883.bd5be8b.c7bc050917c34635a85aa4b55addf359" user_id="7999905883" username="crocal.wedding" columns_large_screen="5" columns="5" columns_tablet_landscape="5" gutter_size="5" limit="10"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Special Moments
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row padding_top_multiplier="3x" padding_bottom_multiplier=""][vc_column content_width="custom" horizontal_content_position="center" text_align="center" custom_content_width="770"][crocal_title margin_bottom="30"]A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring.[/crocal_title][vc_column_text]A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed that I neglect my talents. I should be incapable of drawing a single stroke at the present moment; and yet I feel that I never was a greater artist than now.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner padding_top_multiplier="2x" padding_bottom_multiplier="2x"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][crocal_single_image image_mode="medium" image="211" image_column_space="100"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][crocal_single_image image_mode="medium" image="212" image_column_space="100"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]When, while the lovely valley teems with vapour around me, and the meridian sun strikes the upper surface of the impenetrable foliage of my trees, and but a few stray gleams steal into the inner sanctuary, I throw myself down among the tall grass by the trickling stream; and, as I lie close to the earth, a thousand unknown plants are noticed by me: when I hear the buzz of the little world among the stalks, and grow familiar with the countless indescribable forms.[/vc_column_text][crocal_empty_space height_multiplier="3x"][crocal_title margin_bottom="30"]A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia.[/crocal_title][vc_column_text]When, while the lovely valley teems with vapour around me, and the meridian sun strikes the upper surface of the impenetrable foliage of my trees, and but a few stray gleams steal into the inner sanctuary, I throw myself down among the tall grass by the trickling stream; and, as I lie close to the earth, a thousand unknown plants are noticed by me: when I hear the buzz of the little world among the stalks, and grow familiar with the countless indescribable forms of the insects and flies, then I feel the presence of the Almighty, who formed us in his own image, and the breath of that universal love which bears and sustains us, as it floats around us in an eternity of bliss; and then, my friend, when darkness overspreads my eyes, and heaven and earth seem.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Our store is back
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row padding_top_multiplier="3x" padding_bottom_multiplier=""][vc_column content_width="custom" horizontal_content_position="center" custom_content_width="770"][crocal_title margin_bottom="30"]Build the most stellar WP arsenal Outsmart competition & bring down the house.[/crocal_title][vc_column_text]

A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed that I neglect my talents. I should be incapable of drawing a single stroke at the present moment; and yet I feel that I never was a greater artist than now.

[/vc_column_text][crocal_empty_space][crocal_single_image image_mode="medium" image="138" image_column_space="100"][crocal_empty_space][vc_column_text]

When, while the lovely valley teems with vapour around me, and the meridian sun strikes the upper surface of the impenetrable foliage of my trees, and but a few stray gleams steal into the inner sanctuary, I throw myself down among the tall grass by the trickling stream; and, as I lie close to the earth, a thousand unknown plants are noticed by me: when I hear the buzz of the little world among the stalks, and grow familiar with the countless indescribable forms of the insects and flies.

[/vc_column_text][crocal_empty_space height_multiplier="3x"][crocal_title margin_bottom="30"]A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia.[/crocal_title][vc_column_text]

When, while the lovely valley teems with vapour around me, and the meridian sun strikes the upper surface of the impenetrable foliage of my trees, and but a few stray gleams steal into the inner sanctuary, I throw myself down among the tall grass by the trickling stream; and, as I lie close to the earth, a thousand unknown plants are noticed by me: when I hear the buzz of the little world among the stalks, and grow familiar with the countless indescribable forms of the insects and flies, then I feel the presence of the Almighty, who formed us in his own image, and the breath of that universal love which bears and sustains us, as it floats around us in an eternity of bliss; and then, my friend, when darkness overspreads my eyes, and heaven and earth seem.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
